metadata.description: The sequel to 2018's best-selling political parody, My Hero MAGAdemia: Wall-Might! Timothy Lim and Mark Pellegrini, (Black Hops: U.S.A.-*-G.I., Thump: The First Bundred Days), return to continue the saga of Wall-Might, America's Champion.  This time, Wall-Might and Might-Fence are up against Burning Sanders, the infernal anarchist summoned by the Shadow Government to corrupt America's heroes with his latest weapon: The Blue Pill.  To stop Sanders and his Youth Resistance, Wall-Might will need to collect all six Winfinity States before it's too late!
metadata.name: Wall-Might: First Term, Part II
